title: Who Is Rohit Prasad? Alexa Mastermind To Exit Amazon After 13 Years Amid AI Shake-Up
description: Rohit Prasad, senior vice president and head scientist of artificial general intelligence at Amazon, is set to exit the company at the end of the year. Amazon CEO Andy Jassy informed employees of the decision on Wednesday. Prasad has led Amazon's AGI team since 2023 and oversaw the development of the company’s Nova AI models. Prasad earlier served as the chief scientist behind Alexa and was closely associated with the voice assistant from its early days.
content:

title: Turbulent Times: Market Swings Amid Global Tensions
description: Market fluctuations continue amid geopolitical tensions, with the key focus on the potential resolution of the Russia-Ukraine conflict and concerns over artificial intelligence-driven market dynamics. Notably, emerging market stocks dipped, while currency valuations showed mixed performances across various countries, influenced by domestic economic factors.

title: That famous quote you love might be fake
description: Terry Mattingly writes: Stalking fake C.S. Lewis quotes online, and the new artificial-intelligence pope
content:
The late author C.S. Lewis is frequently quoted as saying things he didn't.
There's no evidence Pope Leo XIV said the Gospel is "woke." That viral quotes is fake.

title: The KnowDis Award for Excellence Presented to Professor Anshul Kumar
description: New Delhi [India], December 18: KnowDis AI, a leading artificial intelligence company founded by IIT Delhi's CS&E BTech alumnus Saurabh Singal, conferred the KnowDis Award for Excellence on Professor Anshul Kumar, Honorary Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering at IIT Delhi. The award was presented on 8th December 2025, during an elegant ceremony held at IIT Delhi. The event was graced by distinguished IIT Delhi faculty members, alumni, and industry leaders who came together to honour Professor Kumar's outstanding contributions to the field of computer science and engineering.
content:
